parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.96

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation
</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Render Time Scope

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns render version of [[PositionWorld]], which is [[PositionASL]] of the model centre [0,0,0] of an object in render scope, rather than transformed [[boundingCenter]] or [[Oxygen_2_-_Manual#LandContact|LandContact]] vertices.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[getPosWorldVisual]] object

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]]; 

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - format [[PositionWorld]] in render scope

</value></part><part><name>x1 </name>=<value> <code>_obj [[setPosWorld]] [[getPosWorldVisual]] _obj;</code>

</value></part><part><name>x2 </name>=<value> <code>_groundObj [[modelToWorldVisualWorld]] [0,0,0] [[isEqualTo]] [[getPosWorldVisual]] _groundObj; //true</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3 </name>=<value> Wave height under a boat:<code>_h = ((boat [[modelToWorldVisual]] [0,0,0]) [[vectorDiff]] [[getPosWorldVisual]] boat) [[select]] 2;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[getPosWorld]], [[setPosWorld]], [[visiblePosition]], [[getPosATLVisual]], [[getPosASLVisual]], [[visiblePositionASL]], [[modelToWorldVisual]], [[modelToWorldVisualWorld]]
</value></part></template></root>
